description: Knowledge base of PlayQ default Comm (common/utility) automation commands with syntax, description, and examples for Copilot-assisted test authoring.

commands.name: Wait In Milli Seconds
commands.description: Pauses execution for the provided milliseconds.

commands.name: Comment
commands.description: Adds a free-form comment to the test log/report.

commands.name: Store Value
commands.description: Stores a literal value into a named variable.

commands.name: Encrypt Password
commands.description: Encrypts password text. Options can control storage or masking.

commands.name: Encrypt Password And Store
commands.description: Encrypts password and saves encrypted value to a variable.

commands.name: Encrypt Text And Store
commands.description: Encrypts text and saves result to a variable.

commands.name: Decrypt And Store
commands.description: Decrypts encrypted text and stores plaintext value.

commands.name: Get Random From List
commands.description: Selects a random element from a JSON array list.

commands.name: Remove Leading Zero From Date
commands.description: Removes leading zeros from month and day portions of a date string.

commands.name: Write JSON To File
commands.description: Writes JSON data to a file path.

commands.name: Attach Log
commands.description: Attaches a message to the test report with MIME and message type.

commands.name: Store Value With Options
commands.description: Stores a value in a variable with optional processing flags.
